mapper.insert: insert into rule (id, warn_id, `name`, battery_type, detail, create_time, update_time, `delete`) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warnId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batteryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delete,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update rule set warn_id = #{warnId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, battery_type = #{batteryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, `delete` = #{delete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, warn_id, `name`, battery_type, detail, create_time, update_time, `delete` from rule
